title: alani123
author: alani123
content: I know this is going to sound weird for bitcointalk, but I thought why not. I'm an old and somewhat trusted member of this forum so it might help to post this here. Maybe we could do some business in the end... My extended family produces many tonnes of extra virgin olive oil every year. Part of the supply is also in par with standards to be sold as biological olive oil. The oil is produced in the Greek island of Crete, which is known worldwide for its millennia old tradition of olive oil production tradition. Crete is also a world acclaimed tourist destination and has a recognizable and respectable brand name internationally. We can potentially assist in branding, bottling, marketing materials as well as arrange transports as needed locally. But the reason I'm turning here is to see if anyone could offer a connection to potential buyers. Basically, if you know, or maybe could contact, potential buyers in your country, then let's try to arrange a deal. Ideally we'd be looking for bulk single point buyers of bottled olive oil. Branding can be discussed later. Of course if a deal is struck with a buyer, you'll get your fair share for being the referral. Payment in BTC welcome If you want to discuss shoot me a PM or write a response so I can message you. (Self-moderated thread because I don't need trolling or off topic replies.)

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: How much is the lowest floor price you can offer for your product? Can you provide the complete details of your product including the price per liters.I want to try exporting some and sell it online but my main concern here is the shipping fee for the goods. Sending picture of your product might be helpful.

comments.author: alani123
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on October 27, 2023, 08:15:40 AMHow much is the lowest floor price you can offer for your product? Can you provide the complete details of your product including the price per liters.I want to try exporting some and sell it online but my main concern here is the shipping fee for the goods. Sending picture of your product might be helpful. You can PM me with a way to message you (for example Telegram or Signal) and I can provide you with any details you might need.

comments.author: 0xG23
comments.body: hey lets link send me pm!

comments.author: meser#
comments.body: Greetings from Turkiye, my neighbor  By saying Turkiye, you may have noticed that I am writing from a place where olive or olive oil is not needed, but I want to write a few things. First of all as we know, the olives grown in Greece and Turkey are of very high quality due to the climate. That's why it has huge demand from all over the world. In order to keep up with this demand, serious work and agreements have to be made. And also it requires high capital.Within this work, there are parts such as packaging, storage and transportation that create serious costs and labor. However, I would like to talk about a method made in Turkiye. Maybe you are already trying this method. I know that cruise ships come to the island of Crete. Each ship has a minimum of 1000 people and it goes up to 5000 people and these people usually come from America. Here you can organize tasting tours for them; you can organize a workshop where they can try gather the olive from the tree to the olive oil stage. You can also include dishes that are unique to the island of Crete and made with olive oil in this workshop. I don't know what the legal sanctions are on this island, but you can open an account on Tripadvisor and put it as a tour, or you can contact the tourism agencies selling tours in there and provide such a service and deliver your olives to consumers faster and at a lower cost. I would like to add something to the question you asked in the subject. Many countries have different procedures for imports. Some are very costly and some have very strict requirements. At this point, my humble advice is to focus on certain countries to start with. 4-5 years ago, a friend of mine from Qatar asked me how much he could import a few products including olive oil. Qatar and the surrounding countries can be a good opportunity for you.

comments.author: alani123
comments.body: Quote from: 0xG23 on November 02, 2023, 08:12:55 PMhey lets link send me pm!I sent you a PM with my Telegram, if you need another medium of communication let me know. Quote from: meser# on November 02, 2023, 08:36:41 PMsnipThanks for the advice komsu. Right now being a producer already took a lot of investment. Managing to build all the infrastructure and do the promotion for selling product in the retail market would be too much of a risk. We're looking for a bulk buyer that will appreciate the quality of our product so we don't have to take this risk ourselves. So if someone knows a bulk buyer to strike a deal with then that would help us tremendously and we would pay well for that.
